Translations.Text: tabaraka alladhi biyadihi l-mul'ku wahuwa ʿala kulli shayin qadirun
alladhi khalaqa l-mawta wal-hayata liyabluwakum ayyukum ahsanu ʿamalan wahuwa l-ʿazizu l-ghafuru
alladhi khalaqa sabʿa samawatin tibaqan ma tara fi khalqi l-rahmani min tafawutin fa-ir'jiʿi l-basara hal tara min futurin
thumma ir'jiʿi l-basara karratayni yanqalib ilayka l-basaru khasi-an wahuwa hasirun
walaqad zayyanna l-samaa l-dun'ya bimasabiha wajaʿalnaha rujuman lilshayatini wa-aʿtadna lahum ʿadhaba l-saʿiri
walilladhina kafaru birabbihim ʿadhabu jahannama wabi'sa l-masiru
idha ul'qu fiha samiʿu laha shahiqan wahiya tafuru
takadu tamayyazu mina l-ghayzi kullama ul'qiya fiha fawjun sa-alahum khazanatuha alam yatikum nadhirun
qalu bala qad jaana nadhirun fakadhabna waqul'na ma nazzala l-lahu min shayin in antum illa fi dalalin kabirin
waqalu law kunna nasmaʿu aw naʿqilu ma kunna fi ashabi l-saʿiri
inna alladhina yakhshawna rabbahum bil-ghaybi lahum maghfiratun wa-ajrun kabirun
wa-asirru qawlakum awi ij'haru bihi innahu ʿalimun bidhati l-suduri
ala yaʿlamu man khalaqa wahuwa l-latifu l-khabiru
huwa alladhi jaʿala lakumu l-arda dhalulan fa-im'shu fi manakibiha wakulu min riz'qihi wa-ilayhi l-nushuru
a-amintum man fi l-samai an yakhsifa bikumu l-arda fa-idha hiya tamuru
am amintum man fi l-samai an yur'sila ʿalaykum hasiban fasataʿlamuna kayfa nadhiri
walaqad kadhaba alladhina min qablihim fakayfa kana nakiri
awalam yaraw ila l-tayri fawqahum saffatin wayaqbid'na ma yum'sikuhunna illa l-rahmanu innahu bikulli shayin basirun
amman hadha alladhi huwa jundun lakum yansurukum min duni l-rahmani ini l-kafiruna illa fi ghururin
amman hadha alladhi yarzuqukum in amsaka riz'qahu bal lajju fi ʿutuwwin wanufurin
afaman yamshi mukibban ʿala wajhihi ahda amman yamshi sawiyyan ʿala siratin mus'taqimin
qul huwa alladhi ansha-akum wajaʿala lakumu l-samʿa wal-absara wal-afidata qalilan ma tashkuruna
qul huwa alladhi dhara-akum fi l-ardi wa-ilayhi tuh'sharuna
wayaquluna mata hadha l-waʿdu in kuntum sadiqina
qul innama l-ʿil'mu ʿinda l-lahi wa-innama ana nadhirun mubinun
falamma ra-awhu zul'fatan siat wujuhu alladhina kafaru waqila hadha alladhi kuntum bihi taddaʿuna
qul ara-aytum in ahlakaniya l-lahu waman maʿiya aw rahimana faman yujiru l-kafirina min ʿadhabin alimin
qul huwa l-rahmanu amanna bihi waʿalayhi tawakkalna fasataʿlamuna man huwa fi dalalin mubinin
qul ara-aytum in asbaha maukum ghawran faman yatikum bimain maʿinin
inna rabbaka huwa aʿlamu biman dalla ʿan sabilihi wahuwa aʿlamu bil-muh'tadina
idha tut'la ʿalayhi ayatuna qala asatiru l-awalina
inna balawnahum kama balawna ashaba l-janati idh aqsamu layasrimunnaha mus'bihina
fatafa ʿalayha taifun min rabbika wahum naimuna
ani igh'du ʿala harthikum in kuntum sarimina
an la yadkhulannaha l-yawma ʿalaykum mis'kinun
qala awsatuhum alam aqul lakum lawla tusabbihuna
qalu sub'hana rabbina inna kunna zalimina
ʿasa rabbuna an yub'dilana khayran min'ha inna ila rabbina raghibuna
kadhalika l-ʿadhabu walaʿadhabu l-akhirati akbaru law kanu yaʿlamuna
inna lil'muttaqina ʿinda rabbihim jannati l-naʿimi
am lakum aymanun ʿalayna balighatun ila yawmi l-qiyamati inna lakum lama tahkumuna
am lahum shurakau falyatu bishurakaihim in kanu sadiqina
yawma yuk'shafu ʿan saqin wayud'ʿawna ila l-sujudi fala yastatiʿuna
khashiʿatan absaruhum tarhaquhum dhillatun waqad kanu yud'ʿawna ila l-sujudi wahum salimuna
fadharni waman yukadhibu bihadha l-hadithi sanastadrijuhum min haythu la yaʿlamuna
am tasaluhum ajran fahum min maghramin muth'qaluna
fa-is'bir lihuk'mi rabbika wala takun kasahibi l-huti idh nada wahuwa makzumun
lawla an tadarakahu niʿ'matun min rabbihi lanubidha bil-ʿarai wahuwa madhmumun
wa-in yakadu alladhina kafaru layuz'liqunaka bi-absarihim lamma samiʿu l-dhik'ra wayaquluna innahu lamajnunun
wa-amma ʿadun fa-uh'liku birihin sarsarin ʿatiyatin
sakharaha ʿalayhim sabʿa layalin wathamaniyata ayyamin husuman fatara l-qawma fiha sarʿa ka-annahum aʿjazu nakhlin khawiyatin
wajaa fir'ʿawnu waman qablahu wal-mu'tafikatu bil-khati-ati
faʿasaw rasula rabbihim fa-akhadhahum akhdhatan rabiyatan
inna lamma tagha l-mau hamalnakum fi l-jariyati
linajʿalaha lakum tadhkiratan wataʿiyaha udhunun waʿiyatun
fa-idha nufikha fi l-suri nafkhatun wahidatun
wahumilati l-ardu wal-jibalu fadukkata dakkatan wahidatan
wal-malaku ʿala arjaiha wayahmilu ʿarsha rabbika fawqahum yawma-idhin thamaniyatun
yawma-idhin tuʿ'raduna la takhfa minkum khafiyatun
fa-amma man utiya kitabahu biyaminihi fayaqulu haumu iq'rau kitabiyah
kulu wa-ish'rabu hanian bima aslaftum fi l-ayami l-khaliyati
wa-amma man utiya kitabahu bishimalihi fayaqulu yalaytani lam uta kitabiyah
thumma fi sil'silatin dharʿuha sabʿuna dhiraʿan fa-us'lukuhu
innahu kana la yu'minu bil-lahi l-ʿazimi
wama huwa biqawli shaʿirin qalilan ma tu'minuna
wala biqawli kahinin qalilan ma tadhakkaruna
fama minkum min ahadin ʿanhu hajizina
taʿruju l-malaikatu wal-ruhu ilayhi fi yawmin kana miq'daruhu khamsina alfa sanatin
yubassarunahum yawaddu l-muj'rimu law yaftadi min ʿadhabi yawmi-idhin bibanihi
waman fi l-ardi jamiʿan thumma yunjihi
wa-alladhina hum min ʿadhabi rabbihim mush'fiquna
illa ʿala azwajihim aw ma malakat aymanuhum fa-innahum ghayru malumina
famani ib'tagha waraa dhalika fa-ulaika humu l-ʿaduna
ayatmaʿu kullu im'ri-in min'hum an yud'khala jannata naʿimin
fala uq'simu birabbi l-mashariqi wal-magharibi inna laqadiruna
ʿala an nubaddila khayran min'hum wama nahnu bimasbuqina
fadharhum yakhudu wayalʿabu hatta yulaqu yawmahumu alladhi yuʿaduna
yawma yakhrujuna mina l-ajdathi siraʿan ka-annahum ila nusubin yufiduna
khashiʿatan absaruhum tarhaquhum dhillatun dhalika l-yawmu alladhi kanu yuʿaduna
inna arsalna nuhan ila qawmihi an andhir qawmaka min qabli an yatiyahum ʿadhabun alimun
qala yaqawmi inni lakum nadhirun mubinun
yaghfir lakum min dhunubikum wayu-akhir'kum ila ajalin musamman inna ajala l-lahi idha jaa la yu-akharu law kuntum taʿlamuna
qala rabbi inni daʿawtu qawmi laylan wanaharan
wa-inni kullama daʿawtuhum litaghfira lahum jaʿalu asabiʿahum fi adhanihim wa-is'taghshaw thiyabahum wa-asarru wa-is'takbaru is'tik'baran
thumma inni aʿlantu lahum wa-asrartu lahum is'raran
faqul'tu is'taghfiru rabbakum innahu kana ghaffaran
wayum'did'kum bi-amwalin wabanina wayajʿal lakum jannatin wayajʿal lakum anharan
ma lakum la tarjuna lillahi waqaran
alam taraw kayfa khalaqa l-lahu sabʿa samawatin tibaqan
wajaʿala l-qamara fihinna nuran wajaʿala l-shamsa sirajan
qala nuhun rabbi innahum ʿasawni wa-ittabaʿu man lam yazid'hu maluhu wawaladuhu illa khasaran
waqalu la tadharunna alihatakum wala tadharunna waddan wala suwaʿan wala yaghutha wayaʿuqa wanasran
waqad adallu kathiran wala tazidi l-zalimina illa dalalan
mimma khatiatihim ugh'riqu fa-ud'khilu naran falam yajidu lahum min duni l-lahi ansaran
waqala nuhun rabbi la tadhar ʿala l-ardi mina l-kafirina dayyaran
innaka in tadharhum yudillu ʿibadaka wala yalidu illa fajiran kaffaran
rabbi igh'fir li waliwalidayya waliman dakhala baytiya mu'minan walil'mu'minina wal-mu'minati wala tazidi l-zalimina illa tabaran
qul uhiya ilayya annahu is'tamaʿa nafarun mina l-jini faqalu inna samiʿ'na qur'anan ʿajaban
yahdi ila l-rush'di faamanna bihi walan nush'rika birabbina ahadan
wa-annahu taʿala jaddu rabbina ma ittakhadha sahibatan wala waladan
wa-annahu kana yaqulu safihuna ʿala l-lahi shatatan
wa-anna zananna an lan taqula l-insu wal-jinu ʿala l-lahi kadhiban
wa-annahu kana rijalun mina l-insi yaʿudhuna birijalin mina l-jini fazaduhum rahaqan
wa-annahum zannu kama zanantum an lan yabʿatha l-lahu ahadan
wa-anna lamasna l-samaa fawajadnaha muli-at harasan shadidan washuhuban
wa-anna kunna naqʿudu min'ha maqaʿida lilssamʿi faman yastamiʿi l-ana yajid lahu shihaban rasadan
wa-anna la nadri asharrun urida biman fi l-ardi am arada bihim rabbuhum rashadan
wa-anna minna l-salihuna waminna duna dhalika kunna taraiqa qidadan
wa-anna zananna an lan nuʿ'jiza l-laha fi l-ardi walan nuʿ'jizahu haraban
wa-anna lamma samiʿ'na l-huda amanna bihi faman yu'min birabbihi fala yakhafu bakhsan wala rahaqan
wa-anna minna l-mus'limuna waminna l-qasituna faman aslama fa-ulaika taharraw rashadan
wa-allawi is'taqamu ʿala l-tariqati la-asqaynahum maan ghadaqan
linaftinahum fihi waman yuʿ'rid ʿan dhik'ri rabbihi yasluk'hu ʿadhaban saʿadan
wa-anna l-masajida lillahi fala tadʿu maʿa l-lahi ahadan
wa-annahu lamma qama ʿabdu l-lahi yadʿuhu kadu yakununa ʿalayhi libadan
qul innama adʿu rabbi wala ush'riku bihi ahadan
qul inni la amliku lakum darran wala rashadan
qul inni lan yujirani mina l-lahi ahadun walan ajida min dunihi mul'tahadan
illa balaghan mina l-lahi warisalatihi waman yaʿsi l-laha warasulahu fa-inna lahu nara jahannama khalidina fiha abadan
hatta idha ra-aw ma yuʿaduna fasayaʿlamuna man adʿafu nasiran wa-aqallu ʿadadan
qul in adri aqaribun ma tuʿaduna am yajʿalu lahu rabbi amadan
ʿalimu l-ghaybi fala yuz'hiru ʿala ghaybihi ahadan
illa mani ir'tada min rasulin fa-innahu yasluku min bayni yadayhi wamin khalfihi rasadan
liyaʿlama an qad ablaghu risalati rabbihim wa-ahata bima ladayhim wa-ahsa kulla shayin ʿadadan
aw zid ʿalayhi warattili l-qur'ana tartilan
inna nashi-ata al-layli hiya ashaddu watan wa-aqwamu qilan
inna laka fi l-nahari sabhan tawilan
wa-udh'kuri is'ma rabbika watabattal ilayhi tabtilan
rabbu l-mashriqi wal-maghribi la ilaha illa huwa fa-ittakhidh'hu wakilan
wa-is'bir ʿala ma yaquluna wa-uh'jur'hum hajran jamilan
wadharni wal-mukadhibina uli l-naʿmati wamahhil'hum qalilan
yawma tarjufu l-ardu wal-jibalu wakanati l-jibalu kathiban mahilan
inna arsalna ilaykum rasulan shahidan ʿalaykum kama arsalna ila fir'ʿawna rasulan
faʿasa fir'ʿawnu l-rasula fa-akhadhnahu akhdhan wabilan
fakayfa tattaquna in kafartum yawman yajʿalu l-wil'dana shiban
al-samau munfatirun bihi kana waʿduhu mafʿulan
inna hadhihi tadhkiratun faman shaa ittakhadha ila rabbihi sabilan

inna rabbaka yaʿlamu annaka taqumu adna min thuluthayi al-layli wanis'fahu wathuluthahu wataifatun mina alladhina maʿaka wal-lahu yuqaddiru al-layla wal-nahara ʿalima an lan tuh'suhu fataba ʿalaykum fa-iq'rau ma tayassara mina l-qur'ani ʿalima an sayakunu minkum marda waakharuna yadribuna fi l-ardi yabtaghuna min fadli l-lahi waakharuna yuqatiluna fi sabili l-lahi fa-iq'rau ma tayassara min'hu wa-aqimu l-salata waatu l-zakata wa-aqridu l-laha qardan hasanan wama tuqaddimu li-anfusikum min khayrin tajiduhu ʿinda l-lahi huwa khayran wa-aʿzama ajran wa-is'taghfiru l-laha inna l-laha ghafurun rahimun
faqala in hadha illa sih'run yu'tharu

wama jaʿalna ashaba l-nari illa malaikatan wama jaʿalna ʿiddatahum illa fit'natan lilladhina kafaru liyastayqina alladhina utu l-kitaba wayazdada alladhina amanu imanan wala yartaba alladhina utu l-kitaba wal-mu'minuna waliyaqula alladhina fi qulubihim maradun wal-kafiruna madha arada l-lahu bihadha mathalan kadhalika yudillu l-lahu man yashau wayahdi man yashau wama yaʿlamu junuda rabbika illa huwa wama hiya illa dhik'ra lil'bashari
liman shaa minkum an yataqaddama aw yata-akhara
bal yuridu kullu im'ri-in min'hum an yu'ta suhufan munasharatan
wama yadhkuruna illa an yashaa l-lahu huwa ahlu l-taqwa wa-ahlu l-maghfirati
bala qadirina ʿala an nusawwiya bananahu
yunabba-u l-insanu yawma-idhin bima qaddama wa-akhara
la tuharrik bihi lisanaka litaʿjala bihi
alam yaku nut'fatan min maniyyin yum'na
alaysa dhalika biqadirin ʿala an yuh'yiya l-mawta
hal ata ʿala l-insani hinun mina l-dahri lam yakun shayan madhkuran
inna khalaqna l-insana min nut'fatin amshajin nabtalihi fajaʿalnahu samiʿan basiran
inna hadaynahu l-sabila imma shakiran wa-imma kafuran
inna aʿtadna lil'kafirina salasila wa-aghlalan wasaʿiran
inna l-abrara yashrabuna min kasin kana mizajuha kafuran
ʿaynan yashrabu biha ʿibadu l-lahi yufajjirunaha tafjiran
yufuna bil-nadhri wayakhafuna yawman kana sharruhu mus'tatiran
wayut'ʿimuna l-taʿama ʿala hubbihi mis'kinan wayatiman wa-asiran
innama nut'ʿimukum liwajhi l-lahi la nuridu minkum jazaan wala shukuran
inna nakhafu min rabbina yawman ʿabusan qamtariran
fawaqahumu l-lahu sharra dhalika l-yawmi walaqqahum nadratan wasururan
muttakiina fiha ʿala l-araiki la yarawna fiha shamsan wala zamhariran
wadaniyatan ʿalayhim zilaluha wadhullilat qutufuha tadhlilan
wayutafu ʿalayhim bianiyatin min fiddatin wa-akwabin kanat qawarira
wayus'qawna fiha kasan kana mizajuha zanjabilan
wayatufu ʿalayhim wil'danun mukhalladuna idha ra-aytahum hasib'tahum lu'lu-an manthuran
wa-idha ra-ayta thamma ra-ayta naʿiman wamul'kan kabiran
ʿaliyahum thiyabu sundusin khud'run wa-is'tabraqun wahullu asawira min fiddatin wasaqahum rabbuhum sharaban tahuran
inna hadha kana lakum jazaan wakana saʿyukum mashkuran
inna nahnu nazzalna ʿalayka l-qur'ana tanzilan
fa-is'bir lihuk'mi rabbika wala tutiʿ min'hum athiman aw kafuran
wamina al-layli fa-us'jud lahu wasabbih'hu laylan tawilan
inna haulai yuhibbuna l-ʿajilata wayadharuna waraahum yawman thaqilan
nahnu khalaqnahum washadadna asrahum wa-idha shi'na baddalna amthalahum tabdilan
inna hadhihi tadhkiratun faman shaa ittakhadha ila rabbihi sabilan
wama tashauna illa an yashaa l-lahu inna l-laha kana ʿaliman hakiman
yud'khilu man yashau fi rahmatihi wal-zalimina aʿadda lahum ʿadhaban aliman
wajaʿalna fiha rawasiya shamikhatin wa-asqaynakum maan furatan
intaliqu ila ma kuntum bihi tukadhibuna
intaliqu ila zillin dhi thalathi shuʿabin
la zalilin wala yugh'ni mina l-lahabi
kulu wa-ish'rabu hanian bima kuntum taʿmaluna
wa-idha qila lahumu ir'kaʿu la yarkaʿuna
